title: Akali - Why was she crippled?
body:
I was thoroughly enjoying Akali prior to the latest Assassin rework. Now I don't want to play her. You deceived us by selling the rework as an enhancement. You have made her weaker and then have the gall to suggest her stupid W teleport thing is more than enough to make up for it. Wow. Why didn't you just state the truth that you think she is OP and you are nerfing her?

Akali in her current form shouldn't even be referred to as Akali.

replies.body:
they already have a few buffs coming up for her which went on the PBE today.

Passive healing AP ratio doubled (0.3 to 0.6).
W energy cost lowered by flat 20 at all levels.
E AP ratio up to 0.7 from 0.5
They pretended they were making her better. They lied!
